name: Dwarf Diggin
description:
In Dwarf Diggin you play as a young Dwarf trying to mine deep into the earth for a variety of natural treasures. The ores you pick up can be used to upgrade seven different aspects of your character. While mining use spells from the power of your ancient dwarven ancestors, and unlock new spells from the shop.

- Use the WASD or arrow keys to move (I recommend arrow keys)

- Use the number keys to use different abilities

- Use the esc button to pause the game while mining

I did not make any of the music or sound effects in this game, they are all royalty free from the website: https://www.zapsplat.com/

Thanks for playing!
